Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 76 off 59 balls to help India reach 176 for seven
Jasprit Bumrah conceded two runs and picked up a wicket in the 18th over
Suryakumar Yadav pulled off a brilliant catch to dismiss David Miller in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: Experts must have predicted a close match given the teams' performance in the tournament
Captain Rohit Sharma emphasized Indiaâ€™s focus on improving their batting in the powerplay
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed relief and joy after the win
Rohit Sharma announced his retirement from T20Is after the win
Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the match by seven runs to emerge champion
Rohit Sharma was mobbed by his teammates after the win
The National flag was run onto the ground by the support staff
Others: India won their second T20 WC title after 17 years
The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Barbados on June 29, 2024
